title: OpenRefine Community Call
description: Bi-weekly video call where everyone is welcome to chat about OpenRefine, ask questions, and share things they do with OpenRefine.

title: OpenRefine Community Call
description: Bi-weekly video call where everyone is welcome to chat about OpenRefine, ask questions, and share things they do with OpenRefine.

title: Data Cleaning Workshop with OpenRefine
description: Hands-on workshop for librarians and archivists to learn data cleaning and transformation techniques using OpenRefine.

title: OpenRefine for Data Journalists
description: Learn how to use OpenRefine for investigative journalism projects, including data scraping, cleaning, and analysis.

title: CSV Conf 2026
description: OpenRefine presentation at CSV Conf - a community conference for data makers everywhere.

title: Wikidata Workshop: Using OpenRefine
description: Learn how to contribute to Wikidata using OpenRefine's reconciliation and upload features.

title: OpenRefine Contributor Sprint
description: Virtual sprint for OpenRefine contributors to work on bug fixes, new features, and documentation improvements.
